author: brane
msg: * branches/1.9.x/STATUS: Move the r1666965 group to the approved section.
I'm doing this because the change does not affect 'svn log' performance
in any significant way, and we do have confirmed reports that it improves
perceived performance in some cases even with 1.9 servers.
